summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 应用程序中数据绑定控件的实体数据模型 (EDM)。

span.span: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 您可以将控件与数据绑定控件一起使用, 以从 EDM 中检索数据, 并使用少量或没有代码对网页上的数据进行显示、编辑和排序。You can use the control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[EntityDataSource Web 服务器控件概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f)。For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                         ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的属性设置为`true`时, 控件将自动从分配给属性的中的参数生成 ORDER by 子句。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 这样就无需显式地将 ORDER BY 子句分配给属性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 如果将属性设置为`true`, 则不应显式将值分配给属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句, 并使用的`OrderByDropDownList`值设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `OrderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ``` 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句, 并使用`DefaultValue` `Parameter`元素的属性设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Parameter` element to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要通过使实体类型属性等于表达式来筛选查询结果, 可以使用属性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the property. 将控件的属性设置为`true`时, 控件会自动从属性的中`WHERE`的参数生成子句。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the of the property. 每个参数的属性必须与查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名称相匹配。The property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 如果将属性设置为`true`, 则不`WHERE`应显式将子句分配给属性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the property. ## 示例Example 在下面的示例中 , 将属性设置`true`为。In the following example the property is set to `true`. 因此, 属性的必须与查询结果中包含的实体类型属性名称相匹配。Therefore, the of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 查询选择 SalesOrderHeader 实体类型的 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue 属性。The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type. 自动生成`WHERE`的子句将通过将 TotalDue 值与在 "TotalDueList 列表框" 控件中选择的值进行比较来筛选查询结果。The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control. ``` ``` ## 示例Example 默认情况下， 属性设置为 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false`. 这意味着我们必须提供该`WHERE`子句。This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause. 在下面的示例中, `WHERE`子句为`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` , totalDueParam 为参数名称。In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否支持在运行时在数据的各部分之间导航。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control supports navigation through sections of the data at run time.

value.span: 如果用户可以对数据进行分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can page through the data; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持自动对查询返回的数据进行分页。The control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries. 属性是一个布尔值属性, 指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用分页。The property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls. 当此属性设置`true`为时 , 控件将根据数据绑定控件提供的信息, 将相应的查询生成器方法添加到中。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 属性的值确定支持数据源的 控件的属性是否为`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the property of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`. 当定义启用了分页的投影时, 必须定义用于对结果进行排序的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着 , 当您将属性设置为定义投影并且将设置为`true`时, 还必须设置属性以定义顺序或将属性设置为`true` , 并添加订单集合的按参数。This means that when you set the property to define a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持对查询返回的数据进行自动排序。The control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries. 控件的属性是一个布尔值属性, 指示是否为绑定到数据控件的查询所返回的数据启用排序。The property of the control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls. 当此属性设置`true`为时 , 控件将根据数据绑定控件提供的信息, 将相应的查询生成器方法添加到中。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 属性的值确定支持数据源的 控件的和属性是否为`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the and properties of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的属性可用于指定使用自定义实体 SQL 表达式的查询。The property of the control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression. 与 SELECT 语句一样, 将创建无法更新的原始数据的投影。Like the SELECT statement, creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable. 当分配了属性时, 将禁用更新、插入和删除功能。When the property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled. 在这种情况下, 相关 控件的方法、和都将返回`false`。In this case, the methods , , and of the related control all return `false`. 设置属性时, 如果将、或的值设置为`true`, 则当方法由绑定到控件的数据的控件调用时, 将引发异常。 When the property is set, an exception is thrown when the method is called by a control that is data bound to an control if the value of , , or is set to `true`. 如果设置为返回属性投影的查询 (例如 "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), 则将返回。 If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的示例使用提供的实体 SQL 命令返回产品对象的集合。The following example uses the supplied Entity SQL command to returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下面的示例返回投影的列系列:The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过存储在应用程序配置文件的[connectionStrings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)元素中的命名 EDM 连接字符串来初始化控件的属性。The property of the control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the [connectionStrings](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) element of the application configuration file. 当使用实体数据模型向导创建 EDM 时, 将在应用程序配置文件中创建一个名为 EDM 的连接。When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file. 在应用程序配置文件中找到命名的 EDM 连接字符串后, 连接将在 EntityDataSource 设计器的 "配置数据源" 向导中显示为一个选项。When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[配置数据源向导 (EntityDataSource 控件)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e). 如果未指定 属性, 则必须设置和属性以使控件创建。 If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件, 以访问 控件用于执行查询和跟踪更改的。Handle this event to access the that is used by the control to execute the query and track changes. 可以存储此上下文对象并将其用于之外的后续操作。This context object can be stored and used for successive operations outside the . 从事件返回的获取。 The is obtained from the that is returned by the event. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[对象上下文生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 有关对象上下文的详细信息, 请参阅[标识解析、状态管理和更改跟踪](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 事件允许你将已创建的分配给一个变量, 以便在外进行后续操作。 The event allows you to assign the that has been created to a variable for successive operations outside the . 属性包含已在事件中创建的上下文。 The property contains the context that has been created in the event. 如果用户未在事件期间分配上下文, 则中包含的上下文实例是基于、 或属性创建的实例。If the user does not assign a context during the event, the context instance contained in is the one created by the based on the , , or properties.

summary.span: 在释放 之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an is disposed of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件可防止释放 控件使用的。Handle this event to prevent the used by the control from being disposed of. 当要在具有多个控件或 控件实例的页面中使用单个实例时, 请执行此操作。Do this when you want to use a single instance in your page with several controls or instances of the control. 若要防止释放, 请将对象的属性设置为`true`。To prevent the from being disposed of, set the property of the object to `true`. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[对象上下文生命周期管理 (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 有关对象上下文的详细信息, 请参阅[标识解析、状态管理和更改跟踪](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 若要保留现有实例成员以供将来参考, 请取消事件, 如以下代码所示。To keep an existing instance member for future reference cancel the event as shown by the following code. ```csharp protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在上成功调用方法 以删除对象后,将引发事件。The event is raised after the method has just been successfully called on the to delete an object. 对象的属性用于访问已删除的对象。The property of the object is used to access the deleted object. 此对象处于状态。This object is in a state. 如果在删除对象时出错, 则会引发事件, 并将对象的属性设置为返回的, 并将属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请将属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序, 属性值存储在视图状态中, 并在回发之间自动维护。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于面向 ASP.NET 4.5 的 web 应用程序, 属性值不会存储在视图状态中, 你必须为每个 HTTP 请求设置值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在上调用 方法前引发事件,以删除对象。The event is raised before the method is called on the to delete an object. 对象的属性用于访问要删除的对象。The property of the object is used to access the object to be deleted. 此对象的属性可能未完全设置。The properties of this object may not be fully set. 只有标识该对象所需的属性才必须设置。Only the properties required to identify the object must be set. 若要阻止删除该对象, 请将 对象的属性设置为`true`。To stop the object from being deleted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果在准备删除对象时出错, 则会引发事件, 并将对象的属性设置为返回的。If an error occurs when preparing to delete an object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 在事件处理程序中处理异常时, 请将属性设置为`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定要包含在查询结果中的相关对象的表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

value.span: 要在查询结果中返回的以逗号分隔的查询路径列表。

span.span: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的属性指定以逗号分隔的查询路径列表, 该列表定义与专门查询的对象一起返回的对象。The property of the control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects that are returned together with the specifically queried object. 字符串中的每个逗号分隔值都将传递, 而不进行修改, 作为对所执行 [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]的的方法的单独调用。Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the method of an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是控件控制的数据源。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 属性是在执行之前应用于的参数。 The property is the argument applied to the before it is executed. 提供给属性的字符串使用的格式与传递到的方法的字符串相同。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用查询路径自动加载相关对象的示例, 请参阅[如何:使用查询路径来绘制结果](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093). 如果使用属性指定查询路径, 则相关实体的属性仅可用于只读数据绑定。When the property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding. 如果未在查询路径中显式包含相关对象, 则属性描述符仍可用于数据绑定, 但属性本身返回 null 值。If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values. 在这种情况下, 必须显式加载相关对象以显示其值。In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[加载相关对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb896272(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记定义一个查询路径, 该`SalesOrderHeader`查询路径返回与返回`Contact`的对象相关的对象。The following XML markup defines a query path that returns `SalesOrderHeader` objects related to the returned `Contact` object. 对于每`SalesOrderHeader`个, 还`SalesOrderDetail`会`Address`返回相关的和对象。With each `SalesOrderHeader`, the related `SalesOrderDetail` and `Address` objects are also returned. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例与下面命名`customers`的示例相同:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `customers`: ``` ObjectQuery customers = context.Contact .Where("it.ContactID = @ContactID", new ObjectParameter("ContactID", customerId)) .Include("SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderDetail") .Include("SalesOrderHeader.Address"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在数据源中创建添加的对象, 或者在将对象数据保存到数据源时出错, 则会引发事件。The event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source. 对象的属性用于访问添加的对象。The property of the object is used to access the added object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源返回的值, 包括任何数据源生成的值。The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values. 如果在将对象保存到数据源时发生错误, 则会引发事件, 并将对象的属性设置为返回的。If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请将属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 在将新对象保留到数据源之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a new object is persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将新的对象保存到数据源之前引发该事件。The event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source. 事件使你可以修改或验证要添加的对象、添加其他对象或取消操作。The event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. 可以访问要从 对象的属性添加的对象。You can access the object to be added from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的对象, 则用户负责在属性中设置正确的实体类型。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 若要停止添加对象, 请将 对象的属性设置为`true`。To stop the object from being added, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果在创建新的对象时发生错误 , 则会引发事件, 并将 对象的属性设置为返回的。If an error occurs when creating a new object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 在事件处理程序中处理异常时, 请将属性设置为`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定如何对查询结果进行排序的 Entity SQL 表达式。

value.span: ORDER BY 子句。

span.span: The ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的属性是一个字符串, 它表示实体 SQL 查询的[ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md)表达式。The property of the control is a string that represents an [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) expression of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串将未经修改传递到 [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]由执行的。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是控件控制的数据源。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 提供给属性的字符串使用的格式与传递到的方法的字符串相同。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用[order BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md)子句对查询结果进行排序的示例, 请参阅[如何:对数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)进行排序。For examples of how to use the [ORDER BY](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/order-by-entity-sql.md) clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7). ## Examples 以下示例中的 XML 标记在 .aspx 文件中, 从控件中检索值, 并将其作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例等效于以下命名`onlineOrders`的:The previous XML example is equivalent to the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件的属性设置为`true`时, 控件将自动从分配给属性的中的参数生成 ORDER by 子句。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 这样就无需显式地将 ORDER BY 子句分配给属性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 从属性中的 ORDER by 子句的构造要求集合中的参数的属性标识从查询返回的项的单个属性。The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the property requires that the property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query. ## Examples 下面的示例自动生成 ORDER BY 子句, 并使用的`orderByDropDownList`值设置参数的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `orderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置投影，该投影定义要包括在查询结果中的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the projection that defines the properties to include in the query results.

value.span: 用于创建 ORDER BY 子句的参数。

span.span: The parameters that are used for creating the ORDER BY clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的属性包含一个字符串, 该字符串表示实体 SQL 查询的[SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md)语句。The property of the control contains a string that represents the [SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) statement of an Entity SQL query. 这使您可以从查询返回的对象投影指定的属性集。This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query. 此字符串将未经修改传递到 [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]由执行的。This string is passed, without modification, to the that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是控件控制的数据源。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 提供给属性的字符串使用的格式与传递到的方法的字符串相同。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用[SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md)子句定义查询投影的示例, 请参阅[如何:执行返回匿名类型对象](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)的查询。For examples of how to use the [SELECT](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/select-entity-sql.md) clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d). 预计的数据不支持更新。Updates are not supported for projected data. 这意味着, 当你使用属性指定投影时, 绑定的数据绑定不支持更新。This means that when you use the property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates. 当定义启用了分页的投影时, 必须定义用于对结果进行排序的属性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 这意味着 , 当您将属性设置为定义投影并且将设置为`true`时, 您还必须设置属性以定义顺序或将属性设置为`true` , 并添加订单集合的按参数。This means the when you set the property to defined a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection. 如果启用了、 或 , 则无法设置。 cannot be set if , , or is enabled. 如果设置为返回属性投影的查询 ( `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`例如), 则将返回。 If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a will be returned. ## Examples 下面的 XML 标记使用属性指定具有该产品类型的六个属性的投影:The following XML markup uses the property to specify a projection with six of the properties of the Product type: ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例与下面命名`products`的示例相同:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `products`: ``` ObjectQuery products = context.Product .Select(it.[ProductID], it.[Name], it.[ListPrice], it.[Size], it.[Style], it.[Weight]) .OrderBy("it.[ProductID]"); ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selected As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在执行查询之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a query has been executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行查询并返回数据后, 会引发事件。The event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned. 如果在查询准备或执行过程中出现错误, 也会引发此错误。It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution. 对象的属性包含从查询返回的对象的。The property of the object contains an of objects that are returned from the query. 处理事件, 以检索中的返回实体并将其存储在中。 Handle the event to retrieve and store returned entities in the . 执行此操作可在页面上保留对象更改。Do this to persist object changes on the page. 对象的属性显示所有页面中对象的总数, 而与数据绑定控件传递的用于分页的值无关。The property of the object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging. 仅当数据绑定控件需要数据绑定控件 (例如启用了分页) 时才检索。 is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled. 如果在准备或执行查询时发生错误, 则会引发事件, 对象的属性将设置为返回的, 并且属性设置为`null`。If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请将属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Selecting As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceSelectingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在构建并执行查询之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造和执行查询前引发事件。The event is raised before a query is constructed and executed. 处理事件, 以便在构造和执行查询之前, 修改或读取或更改数据绑定控件中的参数。 Handle the event to modify the configuration of the or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. 将对象的属性设置为`true` , 以取消查询。Set the property of the object to `true` to cancel the query. 当取消选择操作时, 不会将任何数据返回到数据绑定控件。When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control. 如果`AllowPaging`在数据绑定`true` 控件中将设置为, 则会调用和查询生成器方法来使用的和属性的值。对象。If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the invokes the and query builder methods on using the values of the and properties of the object. 如果`AllowSorting`在数据绑定`true` 控件中将设置为, 则在处理事件时, 可以更改对象的。If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the of the object can be changed when the event is handled. 在引发事件后, 将应用在页标记中指定的任何其他查询运算符 (如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY)。Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与类的方法类似,可以将参数传递给由属性定义的投影。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the projection that is defined by the property. 控件的属性指定一个 , 其中包含要提供给查询的 SELECT 语句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the SELECT statement of the query. 属性使用命名参数来引用提供给属性的字符串中指定的参数。 The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果未设置该属性, 则不会进行参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. SELECT 语句中的所有参数名称 (前缀为 ""`@"`符号`,` ) 在中必须具有匹配的名称。All the parameter names in the SELECT statement, prefixed by the "`@"` symbol`,` must have a matching name in the . 不允许对中的参数使用 Null 值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源中的数据是否存储在视图状态中，以确保数据在更新或删除之前不会由其他进程更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data from the data source should be stored in view state to make sure that the data has not been changed by another process before it is updated or deleted.

value.span: 如果将值存储在视图状态中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the values will be stored in view state; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在启用更新和删除操作时跟踪更改, 控件必须存储有关中加载的对象的原始值的信息。To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the . 在视图状态中存储所需的信息将增加页面大小。Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size. 您可以通过将属性设置为来`false`禁用存储在视图状态中的原始值。You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果这样做, 则无法[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]跟踪已更新对象中的并发。If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[更新数据 (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event Exception As EventHandler(Of DynamicValidatorEventArgs) Implements System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource

summary.span: 在分部方法中验证失败或引发异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when validation fails in a partial methods or when an exception is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现该事件是为了提供与 ASP.NET 动态数据的兼容性。The event is implemented to provide for compatibility with ASP.NET Dynamic Data. 此事件由接口定义, 由显式实现。This event, defined by the interface, is explicitly implemented by the . 无法在标记中注册此事件的处理程序。A handler for this event cannot be registered in markup. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 事件提供一个返回的对象。 The event provides an object that returns the . 在以下情况下, 可能会引发事件:The event may be raised in the following cases: - 创建对象时。When an object is created. 这使得对象上的分部方法可以在属性设置的验证过程中引发异常。This enables the partial methods on the object to raise exceptions during validation of property settings. - 在查询执行过程中发生异常时。When an exception occurs during the execution of the query. - 当执行任何插入、更新或删除操作的过程中发生异常时。When an exception occurs during the execution of any INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE operation.

summary.span: 在将对象更改保留到数据源之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after changes to an object have been persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当修改后的对象的更改保存到数据源或在应用更改时出错时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes. 对象的属性用于访问修改后的对象。The property of the object is used to access the modified object. 此对象的属性包含从数据源返回的值, 包括任何服务器生成的值。The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values. 如果在将更改保存到数据源时发生错误, 则会引发事件, 并将对象的属性设置为返回的。If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果在事件处理程序中处理异常, 请将属性设置为`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

value.span: 在更新操作过程中使用的参数。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于面向 ASP.NET 4 或更早版本的 web 应用程序, 属性值存储在视图状态中, 并在回发之间自动维护。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. 对于面向 ASP.NET 4.5 的 web 应用程序, 属性值不会存储在视图状态中, 你必须为每个 HTTP 请求设置值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 在将对象更改保留到数据源之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将对象的属性更改保存到数据源之前, 会引发事件。The event is raised before changes to the properties of an object are persisted to the data source. 事件使你可以修改或验证对对象所做的更改、提供不同的对象或在保存更改之前取消操作。The event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. 可以从 对象的属性访问修改后的对象。You can access the modified object from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的对象, 则用户负责在属性中设置正确的实体类型。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 如果必须修改对象的以为并发控制设置不同的原始值, 请处理事件。Handle the event if you must modify the for the object to set different original values for concurrency control. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[保存更改和管理并发](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 若要阻止更改被保留, 请将 对象的属性设置为`true`。To stop the changes from being persisted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果在实例化对象或修改属性时发生错误 , 则会引发事件, 并将 对象的属性设置为返回的。If an error occurs when instantiating an object or modifying properties, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 在事件处理程序中处理异常时, 请将属性设置为`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 这会阻止再次引发异常。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 当你`false` 为属性指定的值时, 将重新引发异常。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定如何筛选查询结果的 Entity SQL 表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to filter the query results.

value.span: WHERE 子句。

span.span: The WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件的属性是一个字符串, 该字符串表示作为实体 SQL 查询的谓词的[WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md)子句。The property of the control is a string that represents a [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) clause that is the predicate of an Entity SQL query. 此字符串将未经修改传递到 [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]由执行的。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查询是控件控制的数据源。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 提供给属性的字符串使用的格式与传递到的方法的字符串相同。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 有关如何使用[WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md)子句筛选查询的示例, 请参阅[如何:筛选数据](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2)。For examples of how to use the [WHERE](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/ef/language-reference/where-entity-sql.md) clause to filter a query, see [How to: Filter Data](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2). 若要通过使实体类型属性等于表达式来筛选查询结果, 请参阅有关属性的信息。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, see information about the property. ## Examples 以下示例中的 XML 标记在 .aspx 文件中, 从控件中检索值, 并将其作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例与下面命名`onlineOrders`的示例相同:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与类的方法类似,可以将参数传递给赋给属性的谓词。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the predicate assigned to the property. 控件的属性指定一个 , 其中包含要提供给查询的 WHERE 子句的参数。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the WHERE clause of the query. 属性使用命名参数来引用提供给属性的字符串中指定的参数。 The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果未设置该属性, 则不会进行参数替换。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. WHERE 子句中前面带有符号 "`@"`的所有参数名称都必须具有匹配的名称。All the parameter names in the WHERE clause preceded by the symbol "`@"` must have a matching name in the . 不允许对中的参数使用 Null 值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a . ## Examples 以下示例中的 XML 标记在 .aspx 文件中, 从控件中检索值, 并将其作为参数传递给属性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 上面的 XML 示例与下面命名`onlineOrders`的示例相同:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```
